items.title: Amazon Earnings: 3 Catalysts That Could Drive Shares to $300
items.description: Another blowout quarter from Amazon should re-ignite its rally as AWS growth goes through the roof. Here's why shares could soon be at $300.

items.title: Why Chipotle Stock May Bounce After a Brutal Sell-Off
items.description: Chipotle Mexican Grill bulls capitulated following several quarters of downtrend. A weak forecast sparked the move, but analysts' trends suggest it wa...

items.title: Why VGT May Be a Smarter Bet Than Chasing Individual Tech Stocks
items.description: The Vanguard Information Technology ETF offers a strategic way to invest in top tech firms like NVIDIA, Microsoft, and Apple through a single fund.

items.title: Equinix Stock Rises Despite Lower Revenue Guidance
items.description: Equinix stock jumps after a strong Q3 earnings beat. Despite lower guidance, AI demand and record bookings support the data center REIT’s rebound

items.title: MongoDB: It’s No Trick, This AI Play Is a Treat
items.description: MongoDB is well-positioned to benefit from the proliferation of AI agents and apps, which are on track to scale in the coming quarters.
